'''Genshin Impact × S.E.A. Aquarium''' is a collaborative effort between ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' creators [[miHoYo]] and the Singapore Aquarium {{w|S.E.A. Aquarium}}.

==Collaborations==
To date, there has been '''1''' collaborations between ''Genshin Impact'' and S.E.A. Aquarium.

===Teyvat SEA Exploration===
This collaboriation features [[Sigewinne]] going through a marine adventure through envirenments inspired by [[Fontaine]].

Visitors have the opportunity to see cosplayers between 1PM-4PM on the following dates:
* Sat, 14 Sep
* Sun, 15 Sep
* Thu, 3 Oct
* Fri, 4 Oct
* Sat, 5 Oct

On the event page, Teyvat SEA Exploration Packs are available to book for a limited time.
The promotion period for the packs is from  1 Aug to 28 Oct 2024

Packs include:
* 1 x S.E.A. Aquarium Adult One-Day Ticket (ages 13 and above) or 1 x S.E.A. Aquarium Child One-Day Ticket (ages 4 to 12)
* 1 x Stamp Rally Passport
* 1 x Laser Commemorative Ticket
* 1 x Character Enamel Pin with Display Stand (exclusive to S.E.A. Aquarium only)
